type.name: Contract
type.description: (full documentation goes here)

type.name: Update Step
type.description:
A specialized workflow step responsible for executing changes to the contract. 
This is the sole step type authorized to modify contract content.

type.name: Workflow Step
type.description: Represents a single step within a workflow.

changeset.description:
An ordered list of JSON Patch operations to be applied sequentially.
Each operation modifies the contract's content atomically.

An ordered list of JSON Patch operations to be applied sequentially.
Each operation modifies the contract's content atomically.

type.name: Trigger Event Step
type.description: A specialized workflow step designed to generate and emit a specific event.

type.name: Workflow Step
type.description: Represents a single step within a workflow.

event.description:
Defines the event to be triggered. 

Important: Any ${} expressions within the event object will be evaluated 
at runtime. The actual triggered event will contain the evaluated values, 
not the raw template expressions.

Defines the event to be triggered. 

Important: Any ${} expressions within the event object will be evaluated 
at runtime. The actual triggered event will contain the evaluated values, 
not the raw template expressions.

type.name: Chess Game Started Event
type.description: Informs that the game has started

type.name: Contract Initialization Event
type.description: Represents the initial event that occurs when a new contract instance is being created.

type.name: JavaScript Code Step
type.description:
A versatile workflow step that allows the execution of custom JavaScript code 
within the workflow. This step provides flexibility to perform complex 
operations, data transformations, or custom logic that may not be easily 
achievable with predefined step types.

type.name: Workflow Step
type.description: Represents a single step within a workflow.

code.description: The JavaScript code to be executed as part of this step.
The JavaScript code to be executed as part of this step.

type.name: Agreed Upon Simulated Event
type.description: Represents a virtual event that all parties in the contract have agreed to treat as if it actually occurred.

event.description:
The simulated event that should be processed by the contract as if it were a real occurrence.
This can be any valid event type that the contract is designed to handle, such as a timeline entry,
a state change, or a participant action.

The simulated event that should be processed by the contract as if it were a real occurrence.
This can be any valid event type that the contract is designed to handle, such as a timeline entry,
a state change, or a participant action.

tickSequence.description: A global sequential identifier representing the order of events across all timelines in the simulation.

type.name: External Contract
type.description: Represents an external contract that can be used within another contract.

localContractInstanceId.description: The ID of the local contract instance within this contract.

initiateContractEntry.description: The entry which initiated this contract.

type.name: External Contract
type.description: Represents an external contract that can be used within another contract.

localContractInstanceId.description: The ID of the local contract instance within this contract.

initiateContractEntry.description: The entry which initiated this contract.

localContractInstanceId.description: The ID of the local contract instance within this contract.

initiateContractEntry.description: The entry which initiated this contract.

winner.description: Indicates who won the game (e.g., 'White', 'Black', or 'None' if the game is not over or ended in a draw)

playerToMove.description: Indicates whose move it is ('white' or 'black')

draw.description: Indicates whether the game ended in a draw (true) or not (false)

gameOver.description: Indicates whether the game has ended (true) or is still in progress (false)

type.name: All Events External Contract Subscription
type.description: Represents a subscription to an external contract, to all events emitted by this contract.

type.name: Contract Subscription
type.description: Represents a subscription to a contract.

initiateContractEntry.description: The original Initiate Contract Action timeline entry. This links the processing action to the specific contract initiation.
The original Initiate Contract Action timeline entry. This links the processing action to the specific contract initiation.
